findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials on a WordPress REST API endpoint can enable cross-origin data theft and potentially account takeover if authentication cookies are accessible.
findings.exploitation_steps: 1. Host malicious JavaScript on attacker domain 2. Craft XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials:true 3. Extract sensitive data from response 4. Potentially access other WordPress API endpoints to modify content or extract user data
